project.projectPitch: Using Deep Q reinforcement learning to make the cartpole balance
project.projectDescription: Using Python and the Keras library I created a neural network that uses Async Deep Q algorithm to balance the cartpole. This was also my Bachelors Thesis

project.projectPitch: Creating a rental system using Java and mySQL
project.projectDescription: As a team of 4 we created a rental system for motorhomes with focus on best industry practices in terms of management. We were working with the agile method called UP

project.projectName: Inverse Kinematics in Unity for animation without animating
project.projectPitch: Creating animations for creatures without animating them
project.projectDescription: As part of a larger project my group and I created scripts in Unity for creating movement animations for arbitary animals

project.projectPitch: Creating a pathfinder in Unity using the A* algorithm on arbitary terrain
project.projectDescription: As part of a larger project I created a unity program that can find the fastest route between two points on passable terrain
As part of a nodeJS course I created a portfolio website to showcase my projects and abilities
